1.content:
Rise and shine, James. It's 6:30 on a Tuesday morning, and you have to be at school in an hour. You start your morning routine: shower, shave, eat, and things of the sort. After all that is done, you start walking. As you walk to school, your mind begins to wonder...
'God I hate school.'
'It's so early, I'm so sick of doing this 5 days a week.'
'I wonder if the girl walking across from me noticed me...'
'Shit, that homework was due today.'

Finally, you walk up to the high school, and you wanted to turn right back around.
Time for your first class....

You walk into your homeroom as you're suddenly lunged at from behind.
"Hi, James!" Jocelyn yells at you from behind, giving you a tight hug. She always did look up to you.
"Hey, Jocelyn. Good morning."
"You too!" She says as she lets go and you turn around. She looks so bubbly, and her eyes are full of energy. You have no idea how she can be so energetic at 7:25 in the morning.
You start to walk to your seat as you wait for the day to start. Jocelyn sits next to you, wanting your attention.

"Whew! I'm exhausted! I need a break!"

"My little passenger probably needs a break as well" she says, and chuckles afterwards

"I should probably let him out, but first..."

She reaches behind her back, only to put out a finger, and push it in her butt through her pants.
Then, she lets out a massive gust of wind, moaning "ahhhh~".

From your point of view, you were pushed in and in, the air was getting worse and worse until.... everything stopped. You felt wrinkles around you, and you had a pretty good idea of where you were, not all the way, but pretty deep, and just then...

You felt something changing, suddenly, a huge gust of hot, filthy wind followed by an ear shuttering sound came over you, engulfing you. You didn't know what was worse, enduring all the past hour, or these six or so seconds from hell.

Afterwards, you felt the pushing stop. And you finally saw light. Jocelyn took you out of her trunk, and pulled you up to her face
"All right! I think we both deserve a break after this, don't you?" She went over to a nearby bench and sat down, still holding you firmly in her hand.
"sigh... I'm so sweaty... I need some towel or something..." an idea popped in her head "maybe... some little guy could volunteer to help me? Hmm? What do you say? Of course you will!"

14.content:
Today the Boys and girls both ran on the track James and the rest of his class went to the track, and joined the girls, James, not as sneakily as he hoped, ran so that he ended up right behind Jocelyn, so he could watch her butt bounce with every stride. Jocelyn noticed this, and started thinking of what to do. At about half way through the class, the coaches gave the group a break. James sat at a bench, and Jocelyn quickly followed him. Without a warning, James was shrunk. James looked around, and saw that everything was much bigger, then realizing he shrunk. Then Jocelyn approached and picked you up, and started laughing. “What’s going on?!” you yelled. Jocelyn tried to stop laughing then said. “I shrunk you, down to one inch. I noticed you staring at my butt, when we were running, so I thought that if You liked my butt so much, maybe you should get better aquanted. She said giggling. Before you could respond she quickly stuffed you between her buttcheeks, and gave you a wink. The class soon resumed running, and Jocelyn could barely control her laughter. She kept feeling her enormous buttcheeks rub against your tiny body.
Soon gym class ended, and she ran back to a bathroom stall, and pulled back her panties to see you. She burst out laughing , you still like my butt James?” She said laughing she took you out of the bathroom, set you on the floor in front of the boys bathroom, and unshrunk you. Before you could do anything she said. “you might want to run to the shower, You smell like my butt.” Then she ran off. You got cleaned off, dressed, and went to your next few classes. On your last class, you walked in and when you saw Jocelyn, she started giggling. You were pretty mad, but didn’t want to go through that again, so you didn’t say anything. Then you saw Kayleigh. She walked past you to her desk closer to the back of the classroom. And while she was walking, you couldn’t help but look at her butt swaying as she walked. Jocelyn saw this, and after class, when everyone was leaving, Jocelyn shrunk you, then quickly picked you up. Kayleigh bent over to pick something up, and Jocelyn was about to slide you into Kayleigh’s ass, but then thought that you’d be a fun companion during Track practice. Then she saw their friend Faith, who had the nastiest gas of anyone she knew. What did Jocelyn do?

info.brief_description: Attempt to survive with a naive young giantess.
info.description:
You are James. You are a 17 year old boy who is a senior in High School. You are normally 5'6. prefer butts over boobs.

Jocelyn is a 15 year old Sophomore who is 5'2. She looks very fit, runs track, and sometimes can get very sweaty for such a small girl. She has brown hair and blue eyes. She has B sized boobs, and has a very big, and somewhat infamous, butt. She also has the ability to shrink anyone down just by the thought of them becoming smaller, but no one knows this.... She finds the idea of shrinking someone down more funny than sexual, and will do it out of her own interest to torture a boy much smaller than her.

Just a few things....
Other people being in is fine, but if you can, stick to the main two characters.
No gay/lesbian interaction please.
No shit please, farting is fine, but don't abuse it.
Jocelyn can do anything besides shit, so feet, armpits, all that is allowed as well.
Mouth play is okay, but if he is swallowed, on purpose or accident, he is dead.
Jocelyn is playful, and will use you to the most that she can.
Jocelyn doesn't necessarily HAVE to use her shrinking powers right away.


Have fun, and message me if you have any questions.
